<col *ngIf="config.expandableRows" [style.width]="config.expanderColumnWidth | ngPx" />
<col *ngIf="config.showIndexColumn" [style.width]="config.indexColumnWidth | ngPx" />
<col *ngIf="config.showRowSelectCheckboxColumn" [style.width]="config.selectionColumnWidth | ngPx" />
<ng-container *ngFor="let column of columns">
  <col [style.width]="column.width | ngPx" *ngIf="column.visible" />
</ng-container>
{{ getFieldValue(row, column) }}

{{ config.translations.pagination.rangeKey }} - {{ config.translations.pagination.rangeSeparator }}
/
{{ config.translations.columnSelector.header }}

<th *ngIf="config.expandableRows" class="ng-data-table-expand-column-header"></th>
<th *ngIf="config.showIndexColumn" class="ng-data-table-index-column-header"></th>
<th *ngIf="config.showRowSelectCheckboxColumn" class="ng-data-table-select-column-header"></th>
<ng-container *ngFor="let column of columns; index as i;">
  <th *ngIf="column.visible">
    <ng-data-table-column-filter-template [column]="column"
                                          [customFilterStream]="customFilterStream"
                                          [index]="i"
                                          (filter)="onFilter()">
    </ng-data-table-column-filter-template>
  </th>
</ng-container>
{{column.sortPriority}}
